com.ftpos.library.smartpos.emv

Interface IMessageID


  • public interface IMessageID
    Copyright (C), 2015-2020,FEITIAN Technologies Co., Ltd. All rights reserved. These string identifiers indicate the string that the Kernel requires the App to display to the cardholder.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int APP_EXPIRED_DECLINED 
      static int APP_EXPIRED_ONLINE 
      static int APPROVED
      The transaction is approved.
      static int APPROVED_SIGN
      This message is used to inform the cardholder that the transaction was approved (online or offline) and a signature is required.
      static int AUTHORISING_PLEASE_WAIT
      This message is used to inform the cardholder that online authorization is in progress.
      static int BALANCE
      This message show the balance to the cardholder.
      static int CARD_READ_OK
      This message is used to show that the card read was successful.
      static int CLEAR_DISPLAY
      This message informs the App to clear the display information.
      static int DECLINED
      The transaction is declined.
      static int INSERT_CARD
      This message informs the cardholder to use a contact card.
      static int INSERT_SWIPE
      This message indicates that the current transaction cannot be completed using the contactless interface and should try the contact card or magnetic stripe card.
      static int INSERT_SWIPE_TRY_ANOTHER_CARD
      This message informs the cardholder to switch to the contact card interface, magnetic stripe card interface, or to use another contactless card.
      static int NA 
      static int NO_TRADE_RECORD 
      static int OFFLINE_APPROVED
      Transaction is approved offline.
      static int OFFLINE_DECLINED
      The transaction is declined offline.
      static int ONLINE_APPROVED
      The transaction is approved online.
      static int ONLINE_DECLINED
      The transaction is declined online.
      static int ONLINE_FDDA_FAILED 
      static int ONLINE_FDDA_SUCCESS 
      static int ONLINE_SDA_FAILED 
      static int ONLINE_SDA_SUCCESS 
      static int OP_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN 
      static int PIN
      This message prompts the cardholder to enter PIN.
      static int PRESENT_CARD
      This message prompts the user to present the card to start a transaction.
      static int PRESENT_CARD_AGAIN
      This message informs the cardholder to present card again.
      static int PRESENT_ONE_CARD
      This message indicates that a collision has been detected and the cardholder should present only one card.
      static int PROCESS 
      static int PROCESSING
      This message indicates to the cardholder that the transaction is being processed.
      static int PROCESSING_ERROR
      For EMV contactless transactions, if a general unrecoverable error occurs, the App should show this message to the cardholder.
      static int REMOVE_CARD
      Prompt the user to remove the card from the terminal.
      static int SEE_PHONE
      This message informs the cardholder to see the phone.
      static int SEE_PHONE_AMOUNT
      This message informs the cardholder to check the amount on the phone.
      static int TERMINATED
      This message informs the cardholder the transaction was terminated.
      static int TIMEOUT
      This message informs the cardholder that the transaction has timed out.
      static int TRADE_RECORD_READED 
      static int TRANS_TERMINATED
      This message informs the cardholder the transaction was terminated.
      static int USER_CANCEL
      This message informs the cardholder that the transaction has been cancelled by the user.
      static int WELCOME
      The terminal is in idle state, waiting for a new transaction to begin.
